articles.author: Vineet Ramakrishnan, Cricketnext Staff
articles.title: Glenn Maxwell Takes Indefinite Break From IPL; Alarm Bells for Australia Ahead of T20 World Cup - News18
articles.description: Glenn Maxwell, who was left our of the RCB vs SRH game, revealed that he asked the RCB management to drop him for this game to give himself a mental and physical break.
articles.content: The run-fest in Bengaluru between RCB vs SRH game on Monday would have been ideal for someone like Glenn Maxwell. After all, the Australian hitter had conjured up one of the craziest knocks ever seen… [+2802 chars]
